titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Charde in the countie of Somerset, the second of March 1597 being the first day of the assises there holden.
titleStmt.author: Macey, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Bradock?] for R.D[exter] and are to be soulde by Michaell Hart bookseller in the city of Exceter,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name conjectured by and publisher's name from STC.
Running title reads: The magistrates charge.
Identified as STC 17173a on UMI microfilm reel 715.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
